---
name: ComputeNormalsOfAMesh
---

# Compute Normals of a Mesh

```{index} single: NormalQuadEdgeMeshFilter single: QuadEdgeMesh single: MeshFileReader pair: NormalQuadEdgeMeshFilter; SetWeight
```

## Synopsis

Compute normals of a mesh

## Results

:alt: Input mesh
:scale: 50%
